permission_denied_error: You do not have permission to access this command!
vote_error: Please specify the number of options, list the options, and then name the vote!
vote_search_error: A vote by this name does not exist!
votes_empty_error: You have never created a vote!
log_response: Thank you {u}, I have logged your animal product usage.
undo_response: {u}, I removed your last log entry!
undo_error: You have never used a bad meme!
when_response: It has been {d} since {u} has used animal products! {s}
when_error: To my knowledge, {u} has never used an animal product. Commendable!
chart_error: Please specify between 1 and 365 days as the day count.
quote_name_error: This user does not have a quote attribution name!
set_quote_name_error: Please @mention someone and then write their new quote attribution name.
add_quote_error: Please @mention someone and then write their new quote attribution name.
clear_error: Please specify a number of messages to remove (between 0 and 100)
clear_response: I have cleared {n} message for you.
teach_error: Please specify a part of speech and a word.
forget_error: Please specify a part of speech and a word.
